       ┌────────────────────────────────────────┐ 
    50 │⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢸│ 
       │⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡄⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡸│ 
       │⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢸⢇⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡇│ 
       │⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢠⢇⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡎⢸⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢠⠃│ 
       │⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡄⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡜⢸⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢠⠃⠈⡆⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢸⠀│ 
       │⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡸⠸⡀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢠⠃⠀⡇⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢸⠀⠀⢇⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡎⠀│ 
       │⠀⠀⠀⡠⠳⡀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢠⠃⠀⢣⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡜⠀⠀⢱⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡇⠀⠀⢸⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡇⠀│ 
       │⠤⢤⠼⠤⠤⠵⡤⠤⠤⠤⢤⠧⠤⠤⠼⡤⠤⠤⠤⢤⠧⠤⠤⠬⡦⠤⠤⠤⢴⠥⠤⠤⠬⡦⠤⠤⠤⢼⠤⠤│ 
       │⡠⠃⠀⠀⠀⠀⠱⡀⠀⠀⡜⠀⠀⠀⠀⢱⠀⠀⠀⡸⠀⠀⠀⠀⢣⠀⠀⠀⡸⠀⠀⠀⠀⡇⠀⠀⠀⡜⠀⠀│ 
       │⠁⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠱⡀⡰⠁⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡇⠀⢀⠇⠀⠀⠀⠀⠸⡀⠀⠀⡇⠀⠀⠀⠀⢸⠀⠀⠀⡇⠀⠀│ 
       │⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠱⠃⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠸⡀⡸⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢇⠀⢸⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠘⡄⠀⢰⠁⠀⠀│ 
       │⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢇⠇⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢸⠀⡎⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡇⠀⢸⠀⠀⠀│ 
       │⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠈⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣇⠇⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢸⠀⡇⠀⠀⠀│ 
       │⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠹⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠘⣄⠇⠀⠀⠀│ 
   -50 │⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣿⠀⠀⠀⠀│ 
       └────────────────────────────────────────┘ 
       1                                       10
                        X-LABEL
